questions.text: What does PPE stand for in a workplace context?
What should you do first if you discover a fire in the workplace?

options.label: Try to put it out yourself immediately
Alert others and activate the fire alarm

options.label: Bend at the waist and lift with your back
Bend your knees and lift with your legs
Twist your body as you lift
Keep your legs straight and pull upward

options.label: Directly at or just below eye level
